# User Story
As a &lt;role&gt;, I want &lt;to action or feature&gt;, so that &lt;value&gt;.

## Acceptance Criteria

- Given &lt;initial condition&gt;
    - When &lt;event or action&gt;
        - Then &lt;expectation&gt;
